text: @cnnbrk Because the vaccine “safety” tests failed astronomically.  It will never be safe because 1. All coronavirus vaccine tests have failed for decades 2. This new vaccine is very dangerous because they plan on altering DNA  3. It is headed by Bill Gates who is a eugenic.
